card.name: Multi Shot
card.description: Add a random Justice spell costing 3 or more to your hand. It costs 3 less.

description.now: Add a random Justice spell costing 3 or more to your hand. It costs 3 less.
description.prev: Deal 1 {{DMG}}. If it killed a monster, add a {{CARD:181|1}} to your hand. If it had >= 2 base {{HP}}, gain 1 {{GOLD}}.
